talks.title: Essence of Functional Programming
talks.description:
We try to make sense of the ideas underpinning functional programming.

We explore the roots of functional programming in lambda calculus, discuss why functional programming is becoming so hip, and hell, even delve into a little bit of Haskell in hopes of better understanding how to write good quality code.

talks.title: Introduction to Elixir
talks.description:
This talk explores a fairly new functional programming language, Elixir, the love child of Erlang and Ruby.

We'll discuss the pros and cons of both Ruby and Erlang and how Elixir overcomes them both.

talks.title: Managing Application State with Redux
talks.description:
We discuss keeping large application state in a single store and handling state transitions through pure functions only.

We look into the utilities Redux provides for managing application state, and how it sits nicely next to React.js.

We also discuss how managing state in a functional manner can lead to better quality UI, and lesser cognitive load.

talks.title: Cross platform Mobile apps with ReactNative
talks.description: The talk is an introduction to ReactNative + Mobx, and how it compares to native development on both iOS & Android platforms.
